-- | Extra functions for the Control.Newtype typeclass
--   
--   Extra functions for the Control.Newtype typeclass
@package newtyper
@version 0.1

module Control.Newtyper
packM :: (Monad m, Newtype n o) => (a -> m o) -> a -> m n
unpackM :: (Monad m, Newtype n o) => (a -> m n) -> a -> m o
packF :: (Functor f, Newtype n o) => (a -> f o) -> a -> f n
unpackF :: (Functor f, Newtype n o) => (a -> f n) -> a -> f o
